name: Dodger - Gyroscope based game
description:
Looking for something new?

Dodger is for you! Gameplay based on gyroscope and acceleration will create you hard challenge. Rotate your phone to evade enemies. Pick different bonuses, that will diversify your experience. Try to beat your records. And challenge your friends! You can get great score only if you have high IQ.

Unlock rare skins and themes to create your own story. Try your luck!

Go and play it)

Features:

-Optimized for one hand gaming!

-Gyroscope gameplay.

-10 unique maps and themes(Cookies, space, police, minimal and smart).

-Lucky bonuses.

-No annoying advertisement.
